title: How to Make Vegetable Salad With Curry Soy Vinaigrette

Toss warm vegetables with tomatoes, shallots, chives, cilantro and vinaigrette.

text: Make the vinaigrette first. Mix all the ingredients in a small plastic container, cover and shake until blended. Make the salad. Cut tomatoes into quarters. Cook broccoli, cauliflower, turnip and haricots verts in a large pot of boiling water until crisp-tender. This will take about 5 minutes. Drain well.  Toss warm vegetables with tomatoes, shallots, chives, cilantro and vinaigrette.  Finished.
